{3}, {T}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{2}, {T}, Exile The Champion: Search your library for a legendary artifact card that isn't a creature, reveal it, and put it on the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Spells you cast that target a creature you control cost {2} less to cast.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Exile The General: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}, {T}: Tap target creature
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn
Exile The Provider: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Exile The Savant: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
You start the game with an additional 7 life.
Exile The Tyrant: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

Your starting hand size is increased by 1.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
Exile The Warmonger: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
{T}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
Players can't cast spells until the Hydra's next turn.
Each player may sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way chooses a Head and taps it. Each player who didn't sacrifice a creature loses 3 life.

Put exactly two cards named Hydra Head onto the battlefield from the Hydra's graveyard. If you can't, reveal cards from the top of the Hydra's library until you reveal a Head card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into the Hydra's graveyard.
Hero's Reward — When Hydra Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life.
Each Head gains indestructible until the end of the Hydra's next turn.

If there are five or more Heads on the battlefield, tap two of them and they don't untap during th Hydra's next untap step. Otherwise, reveal the top card od the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card.
Choose one — Noxious Hydra Breath deals 5 damage to each player; or destroy each tapped non-Head creature.
Hero's Reward — When Ravenous Brute Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life and draws a card.

At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Savage Vigor Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.
At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, each player discards a card. Hero's Reward — When Shrieking Titan Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.
At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, Snapping Fang Head deals 1 damage to each player. Hero's Reward — When Snapping Fang Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.
Destroy target Head. If that Head was elite, the Hydra takes an extra turn after this one.
Each players exiles a creature he or she controls. Until the Hydra's next turn, when a Head leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' controls.
Tap up to two Heads. They don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Torn Between Heads deals 5 damage to each player.
Unified Lunge deals X damage to each player, where X is the number os the Heads on the battlefield.
